p.i: A weighty kite shield_of_the_crusader painted with a faded, crimson cross.

description.p: Bonus. +1 shield_of_the_crusader. Can only be wielded by a lawful being.
Benefit. Once per day, you can speak a prayer to wreathe the shield_of_the_crusader in holy flames, granting +2 to your AC for 3 rounds.
